attributes.title: APP GAVE MY PHONE A VIRUS
attributes.review: Please do not get this app! I am personally a bunker boy supporter and download this app to see bunker boys plans for 2020. I am so disappointed to find out my phone needs to be taken to Apple to get rid of the virus this app gave me. It hijacked my calendar into getting notification saying to “keep your identity private on the web” is has leaked all of my information all over the web.

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: I have a question how could any human being well clearly if you wanted to vote for a racist and racist and a horrible person in general you are not ok for many reasons. What’s wrong with you if you vote for him especially if you are a woman,African and a Mexican guess what he doesn’t support you OPEN YOUR EYES . He is the worst president in America history . Karen get over it Gen Z is more powerful than you’ll ever be.

attributes.title: Oompa Loompa
attributes.userName: mt name is timmy one put
attributes.review: I got this app and it took two weeks for it to even download and when I opened  it showed this huge orange Cheeto and scared the hell out of me so I fell off my house and even fell on to my grappas pie and then was told to get up because you are now grounded for sneaking out says my mom any then I show her the Cheeto lookin thing and she passed out and I’m am now in the waiting room because the Cheeto thing

attributes.title: Im scared 😔✌️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what it had in store. Little do I know it’s a 12 hours to download !! But anyways I was greeted to a much scarier thing Donald J Trump croissant 🥐!! I was very scared at that point😔 then another thing pop up ..… A herd of Karen’s saying,rEaL wOmeN vOtE fOr tRumP,dOnT nEeD nO LiBertY cUmp. Full on scared at this point 🤡I saw a clip of Trump beating his meat 🥩 !! I close the app and deleted it and then bleach my eyes !! NowI’m blind and It won’t get out my head!!😔😔🕊

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
attributes.review: My niece was playing w my phone and she opened the app, three minutes later I hear screaming and she had a terrible anxiety attack. I asked her what happened and why she was screaming at the top of her lungs and crying and she said it’s because she saw the orange man :( very upsetting so i had to delete the app. Please everybody don’t let your children come anywhere near the app it is not safe for children.

attributes.title: NO❤️
attributes.review: ABSOLUTE WORST APP EVER. DO NOT RECOMMEND. downloaded the app and this scary looking orange appeared on my screen and gave me an absolute heart attack it’s a miracle i’m still alive. this app completely hacked my phone and gave me corona don’t even know how that’s possible but it happened. also my grandma downloaded the app and got corona from it too, sadly, she didn’t make it. do NOT download this if you don’t want to get sick and possibly die.

attributes.title: ✨I hate this✨
attributes.review: this is what happens when you try to delete TikTok, babe😊 you have messed with the wrong generation. what you fail to realize is that one of us is just going to literally make another app, and we’re all just going to keep switching to other platforms. you can keep trying to run, bunker baby, but you can’t hide for long. much love🧚‍♂️✨💖

attributes.title: FAKE
attributes.review: this app took 4 months to download 😡 i tried to utilize the platform only to realize that all the content was cluttered and clumsily put together 🤬 if you are trying to find information about the election this is not the way to go 😾 my first born child was abducted after i downloaded this app ☹️ i’m afraid if you download you’ll be abducted as well 🙀 please be cautious and not download 😔

attributes.title: nalgas guangas
attributes.review: This app gave me cancer not only that but my pet fish drowned because of all this terrible service 😡😡the app told me I couldn’t speak Spanish because I am Korean 😡😡🤚🏽🤚🏽 I never supported but after this I  will continue to not support not only that but I got ads, they gave me aids, 😡they told me because I am Mexican😡 I will get cancer and die, 😡but little do they know I’m not Mexican I’m not brown I’m simply Purple 😡💜💜 nalgas guangas 💋

attributes.title: What a ✨🧚😌🥰 joke
attributes.review: I woke up this morning thinking, my life could be much better if this President would just resign. I know so many people who would love to see him out of office, and with The most recent vote by the Supreme Court in order to disclose his tax returns, I’m so excited to see what the next few months look like for him. 🤷🏻‍♂️😈😱 he’s ruined so many lives 🥺🧚👄 do all lives really matter? 🙉😩😗
